original_text: For they are wholly given unto me from among the children of Israel; instead of such as open every womb, even instead of the firstborn of all the children of Israel, have I taken them unto me.
korean_text: 그들은 이스라엘 자손 중에서 내게 온전히 드린 바 된 자라 이스라엘 자손 중 모든 초태생 곧 모든 처음 태어난 자 대신 내가 그들을 취하였나니

sentences.original_text: For they are wholly given unto me
from among the children of Israel
instead of such as open every womb

sentences.korean_translation: 즉 이스라엘 자손의 모든 장자 대신에

sentences.original_text: of all the children of Israel
have I taken them unto me
